      • fromFile

        public static <T> T fromFile(java.io.File file,
                             java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Read a json object from the given file, and try to cast the read object to the given class.
        Returns:
        the read object, or null if the file doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - when there is a syntax error in this json file

      • toFile

        public static void toFile(java.io.File file,
                          java.lang.Object obj)
        Write the given object to the given file.
        Note: If file already contain data, the old data will be discarded.

      • toJson
